description:
Five thousand years ago, traditional Chinese medicine shared the profound wisdom and connection between the physical body and the emotional body. If you have kidney issues, you could have fear. If you have fear issues, it could affect your kidneys. They are interrelated. In this course you will learn how to transform fear and blockages in the kidneys.

This interactive 45-minute course is presented in six segments where you will learn sacred, simple, practical and highly-effective techniques to self heal anger. You will also receive extraordinary soul healing blessings from Dr. and Master Sha for healing anger.

This course is appropriate for anyone who suffers from occasional to chronic fear, and for anyone who wishes to prevent fear or kidney issues, and is appropriate for all age groups. Instructions are given verbally and visually to support your learning.
title: How To Self Heal Fear
